short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The most secure, web-based password management for teams of all sizes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed for security and crafted for IT teams, Securden's on-premise, self-hosted Password Manager lets you centrally store, organize, share, and keep track of all passwords.
